definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: In addition to Korean, Mr. Ban speaks English and French.
sentences.chinese: 除韓國語外，潘基文先生還講英語和法語。

sentences.english: Chapter Three: This chapter is focused on the comparison between Chinese Xiehouyu and Korean corresponding proverbs.
sentences.chinese: 第三章主要考察歇後語在韓國語中的對應關係。

sentences.english: Then in the second chapter has studied the progressive aspect in Korean.
sentences.chinese: 然後在第二章中研究了韓國語的進行形態。

sentences.english: Icome from Mishan, and I am studying Korean at the Far East Institution with Haerbin University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 我的故鄉在密山，現在在哈理工遠東學院學習韓國語。

sentences.english: But I will not be a Korean.
sentences.chinese: 但我卻一句韓國語也不會。
